comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

When enabling Shockwave Flash Player 11.1.102.55 , The Page Up / Page Down buttons function as Backward / Forward buttons. When disabling the Flash Player or downgrading it to version 10, the problem is fixed.
